select.if: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT g.gameIdx) as totRecCnt FROM itGame g LEFT JOIN itReview r ON g.gameIdx = r.revGameIdx AND r.revMid = #{mid} WHERE r.revMid IS NULL;

select count(*) as totRecCnt from itGame g LEFT JOIN itReview r ON g.gameIdx = r.revGameIdx AND r.revMid = #{mid} where g.gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') or g.gameSubTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%');
SELECT g.* FROM itGame g LEFT JOIN itReview r ON g.gameIdx = r.revGameIdx AND r.revMid = #{mid} WHERE r.revMid IS NULL ORDER BY ${viewpart} LIMIT #{startIndexNo}, #{pageSize};

select g.*, r.* from itGame g LEFT JOIN itReview r ON g.gameIdx = r.revGameIdx AND r.revMid = #{mid} where g.gameTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') or g.gameSubTitle like concat('%',#{search},'%') order by ${viewpart} limit #{startIndexNo},#{pageSize};

mapper.select: select * from itReview where revMid=#{mid} and revGameIdx=#{gameIdx};
select * from itCommunity where mid=#{mid} and cmGameIdx=#{gameIdx};
mapper.update: update itReview set rating=#{rating}, state=#{state} where revMid=#{mid} and revGameIdx=#{gameIdx};
update itCommunity set cmContent=#{vo.cmContent}, rating=#{vo.rating}, state=#{vo.state} where mid=#{vo.mid} and cmGameIdx=#{vo.cmGameIdx} and part='리뷰';
mapper.delete: delete from itReview where revMid=#{mid} and revGameIdx=#{gameIdx};
